abstract: Chinese government is worried about any incidents that might upset its staged military parade in Beijing, including arrival of any stray birds; trained monkeys have been climbing trees near parade route, destroying bird nests under commands of their handlers.
lead_paragraph: Chinese news websites have recently featured monkeys trained to tear apart the nests of birds that might foul up the engines of fighter jets involved in a military parade on Thursday.

headline.main: Preparing for a Military Parade, China Deploys a Troop of Monkeys
headline.print_headline: Beijing Officials Unleash a Simian Secret Weapon

snippet: Chinese news websites have recently featured monkeys trained to tear apart the nests of birds that might foul up the engines of fighter jets involved in a military parade on Thursday.
